title: Chicken and chestnut mushroom pie
ingredients: ['vegetable oil, for frying', '1/2 onion, diced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '500g chestnut mushrooms, cleaned', '500g leftover chicken, diced', 'few springs thyme, fresh or dried', '2 celery stalks, cleaned and sliced', '1 litre chicken stock', '500 g puff pastry']
